body.p:
20
April 13th
Maj. W. H. Sidell -- U. S. A.
A. A. P. M. General --
Louisville -- Ky.
Major.

Your's in relation to the 2nd Ky. Heavy Art. has just been received. The Governor has directed that these men be allowed to select the regiments to which they will be attached. Any musters you may make, therefore, will meet his approval -- and as far as the State has authority, will be acquiesed in. The War Dept. declined to muster in less than a regiment of Heavy Art. This we failed to obtain. Consequently we must consolidate the fragments with commands now in the field. Enlistment papers for all the men were held by the parties recruiting them. The whole number of men of that regiment have left for Louisville.

Respectfully
Your obt Sev't.
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Ky.
